nodes.text: Organization for Droid and Machine Abuse

The Organization for Droid and Machine Abuse was a group dedicated to stopping the exploitation and abuse of droids. The group was represented on the Rebel Alliance star cruiser Independence's Department 1007, on Civil Deck 10.

During his recounting of Ace Azzameen's training mission involving the staged rescue of an R2 unit, the Rebel's droid, MK-09, suggested readers contact the organization to complain about the abuse of the R2.
